overview: A Tornado in the Saddle starred Russell Hayden as the new sheriff of Crestview. Hot on the trail of a gang of claim jumpers led by Dalton and Slim, the novice lawman also has to deal with hotheaded wrangler turned deputy Bob Wilson, whom he is constantly forced to fight, but only after prudently removing his sheriff's star.
tagline: HARD-RIDIN', HARD-HITTIN' HOMBRES...FILLING THE SCREEN WITH THRILLS AND THE AIR WITH SONGS OF THE SADDLE!
title: A Tornado in the Saddle
